job_tasks.phrase: researching, training, building, evaluating, scaling and improving Machine Learning models.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of creating and refining machine learning models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with GenAI tools (ChatGPT, OpenAI APIs, Long Chain, etc...)
job_tasks.justification: The use of GenAI tools like ChatGPT and specific frameworks like LangChain indicates involvement in generative modeling tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn.
job_tasks.justification: Listing specific AI/ML toolkits and libraries like PyTorch, Transformers, and Scikit-Learn points to hands-on work in model development and experimentation.

job_tasks.phrase: Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
job_tasks.justification: This shows a deep dive into the theoretical underpinnings required for model development and refinement.

job_tasks.phrase: Proficiency in writing and testing production-ready Python
job_tasks.justification: Focus on production-ready code implies software development practices for deploying AI/ML solutions.
Proficiency in programming languages is fundamental to software development, especially for building applications around AI/ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs
job_tasks.justification: Building and maintaining APIs for ML models is a direct software development task for integrating models into applications.
Explicit mention of MLOps indicates responsibilities related to operationalizing and maintaining ML models in production.

job_tasks.phrase: Proficiency in MLOps and wider DevOps
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the operational aspect of managing AI/ML systems, aligning with MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding client business needs and aligning ML strategies with those goals.

job_tasks.phrase: guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a role in mentoring and improving the data-related capabilities of team members, which requires understanding their development needs.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
A keen interest in industry best-practice around standards, quality and continuous improvement in the field of Data Science (AI/GenAI/ML)

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes researching, training, evaluating, and scaling traditional Machine Learning models, along with understanding mathematical foundations. While GenAI tools are mentioned, the core focus and breadth of listed technologies and tasks lean heavily towards general ML engineering and software development practices for ML model deployment.
